testcase.name: Money transfer should be available
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to login page...............................................passed Then User logs in as a customer.............................................passed When User clicks on my operations...........................................passed And User navigates to money transfer button.................................passed And User selects an account from account dropdown "<From>"..................passed And User selects an account to account dropdown "<To>"......................passed And User enters amount of balance "30"......................................passed And User provides a description for transfer "30$ transferred between checking and saving accounts".passed And User clicks on make transfer button.....................................passed And System should display success message as "Transfer is succesfull".......passed And User clicks on my operations............................................passed And User navigates to my accounts button....................................passed Then User should be able to see accounts information after transaction......passed
